TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509ChainStatus extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供一个用于存储 X509 链状态和错误信息的简单结构。

span.span: Provides a simple structure for storing X509 chain status and error information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结合使用此结构属性。This structure is used in conjunction with the property. ## Examples 下面的示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许用户选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows the user to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于你选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainStatusFlags Status { System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainStatusFlags get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainStatusFlags value); };

summary.span: 指定 X509 链的状态。

span.span: Specifies the status of the X509 chain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标志可以用于确定链错误的详细信息。The flag can be used to determine the details of a chain error. ## Examples 下面的示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许用户选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows the user to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于你选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#4)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ StatusInformation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Specifies a description of the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是一个本地化的字符串，提供的说明枚举。This property is a localized string that provides a description of the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许用户选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows the user to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于你选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select.
